::RebelYell::
RebelYell was not far from the battle. He still heard
the weapons fire and exploding shells. He still could
not remember a thing, but had noticed the brave bots
defending that ship, willing to give up their lives
for what they believed in. He hoped he had been one of
them. Something was drawing him back there. He
transformed back to robot mode. He was still in pain,
but he began to walk back to the battle.
